description: Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with Condition 1 (Approved plans) for Application Reference Number: 21/00809/HOU (Conversion of existing garage to a habitable space with associated changes to fenestration and the erection of single storey side/rear extension.) dated 12/05/2021. Variation to increase the size of the side/rear extension.
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be carried out in accordance with the materials specified on the approved plans and on the submitted application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with Policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The flat roof area(s) of the development to which this permission relates shall not be used as a roof garden, balcony, seating area or other similar amenity area, and shall not be accessed except for the purpose of maintenance or in the case of emergency.Reason: To ensure satisfactory living conditions for neighbouring occupiers, in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The development hereby permitted must have commenced  before the expiration of three years from the date of the  original planning permission ref no 21/00809/HOU, as granted on 12.05.2021. Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

Notwithstanding the above condition, the facing materials used in the extension hereby approved  shall match those of the existing building(s) unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
